comment: I took the World Lit may-mester class. Easiest thing ever. Lots of short essay and discussion posts, but totally doable. No quizzes. Lewis gives so many options to do for your final project. Made a 100 as my final grade. Take this class over the summer. You won't regret it.

Dr. Lewis was amazing! I took her for a Maymester class and she made everything so stress free. Her expectations were very clear and the class was laid out to make everything easy to find. She's very easy to contact if you have any questions or concerns. I would definitely recommend!!
For ENGL 4580 - 20th Century Lit. Great class - new material, fun final project. This was my last elective but loved this professor, highly recommend, take if you can!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: She was a great teacher; she is really nice and understanding if something comes up and miss and assignment just let her know and she'll more than likely give you a pass but don't make it a habit. You do a lot of essays but it pretty easy and she gives you ample amount of time to do them at least 1-2 weeks. would highly recommend.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Gives good feedback

comment: Great professor, probably one of the best at KSU! She allows 7 UNEXCUSED absences with NO penalty. Super caring and understanding, as well as replies to emails fast. I would take her a million more times if I could. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!

Please take Dr. Lewis; she is an amazing professor who cares for her student's success! The class is primarily made up of free writes, major assignments (plenty of time to prepare), and reading checks. I took the hybrid version of the class and both the in-person and online components we're very well organized. Her emphasis is on creativity.

Amazing teacher. She's very friendly and chill with her work. She practices free write and allows us to write with more feelings and our own words. Allows us to be informal about it and doesn't really care for grammar too much. She makes every assignment feel fun. She's one of those fun teachers that makes learning stress-free and enjoyable

Dr Lewis was the best! She was super understanding even if you made a pretty big mistake in your work and would let you redo it. She understands that us students have lives outside of school and is willing to work with us to keep us stress free. Workload was barebones. Discussion here and there and essays were short and easy. EASY A!!!

The whole semester revolves around one final research paper. There are smaller assignments that help you prepare for the paper and that help guide you while writing it. I would definitely recommend anyone to take her class.

She is one of the best English teachers I've had. Her class consists around focusing on one final paper that you work on throughout the semester. There are smaller assignments that help you write your paper. She gives great feedback and responds relatively quick over email. Definitely recommend this professor!!

best teacher Ever! she really cares about her students and our lessons were super relevant to current events in society. Professor Lewis is great at providing feedback and she doesn't grade hard at all! I honeslty wish I took this in person because of how good her lectures and discussion boards were. TAKE THIS PROFESSOR FOR AN EASY A

This class is so easy! The class consists of discussions, short papers (2 pages), and a final project. No quizzes or tests. She's a super easy grader, got a 100 on all but one of my assignments. Take her!!!!!!!!

I look Engl 4580 with this professor. There were a few "papers" throughout the semester. Most of the grades come from discussion posts and free writes. She was a very nice professor who offered some extra credit and allowed for movies/tv show episodes near the end of the semester which was a nice break.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--So many papers--Accessible outside class

comment: The best. So caring, wants students to succeed. Graded off hw, in class work, & pop quizzes (hints when, easy material). Shows, movies, & short reading for hw. In class convos & entertaining lectures. SO FUN. Love her and this class.

My favorite professor that I have ever had at KSU. I took this class online in Spring 2023, and she was absolutely amazing. Not only did she organize her class extremely well, but she also showed great communication through group me and announcements. This made her class feel so much more personable. TAKE HER if you get the chance. So awesome

Only one research paper the entire semester. The whole semester and each unit is just how to write a research paper. You do parts of it as you go along and are given a lot of time to do it. A lot of completion/participation grades that take no more than 30 mins. The lectures are short and to the point. Easy A.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Very nice lady. The content just wasn't interesting by any means. Everything is about social issues and victim complexes. A lot of busy work and one paper the entire semester, but it takes forever to get through.

This is the best english professor ever. TAKE HER. She is so nice and will go above and beyond to help you. She gives discussions or free- writes that are so easy. 2 Response prompts which gives you options to choose what you want to write it over. We discuss more than just writing, like movies/tv shows. The final is a project which is really easy.

Great professor for online World Lit. Have assignments due Tuesdays and Saturdays that include discussions or free-writes. 2 major grades, but very easy grader and gives opportunities for extra help! Would definitely take again!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: Dr Lewis is the best! The work load is easy and makes it easy to balance with other hw from other classes. She is very kind, caring, and is always there if you need something. Take her!

This teacher really cares for her students and will work with you on anything? She does not grade to harshly and has some of the best feedback I have every received in an English class here at Kennesaw. Would highly recommend her if possible!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Beware of pop quizzes--Accessible outside class

comment: Dr. Lewis has easily been one of my favorite professors by far. She is very nice and is a very easy grader. You will more than likely get an A on an assignment just for answering the prompt questions. There aren't any right or wrong answers on majority of the assignments. She just wants to see your thoughts and ideas. Lectures are very engaging too

She is the best Lit professor I have ever taken. The class mostly consists of reading short stories and then discussing them in class. She is very energetic and made me feel highly engaged in the class. There are some pop quizzes, but they are rare and easy. Most grades come from essays, which are not too hard.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Gives good feedback--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Class is manageable. Activities were straightforward, lots of busy work. All the content is about how everyone is oppressed or a victim so if you write about how unfair the world is you'll be good.

VERY easy class. English composition in and of itself is a bit of a joke, but online it's even more straightforward. As such, this class is an easy A. If you are able to write even semi-comprehensibly, you will be fine. Just be sure to write about what she wants to hear.

Fantastic professor to take. Made every single lecture engaging and enjoyable. As someone who has struggled with lit classes in the past, this course was a breath of fresh air. No tests, but a few writing assignments.

GREAT professor. Lectures are interesting and material isn't the "basic" American Literature Books. Great Grader who offers feedback. Gives extra credit & is very flexible/accessible. Genuine professor who cares and wants to help you succeed. Also 3 1-page writing assignments instead of exams! I would 100% recommend.

Fantastic teacher. Has so many different options for the help you need including remind messages, zoom sessions, instructional videos, and group help. She offered extra credit and is a fair grader. Super nice!

Attendance is mandatory but she gives you 6 freebies to use during the semester and the work for your missed days get exempted. She does not give test and you only have 4 papers during the semester. There is no final exam it is a final project.
She is honestly a great teacher that actually wants to see you pass and do your best. The work load wasn't bad at all.

A great professor, and I mean great! Lectures are very engaging and allow students to really express their thoughts. By far one of the easiest and most fair professors I've had with grading. Participation will make you thrive in this class so be sure to show up as often as you can. She does take attendance but does give you free days to miss.

SUPER EASY CLASS. take her. it is thought provoking but easy. PROFESSOR AMELIA IS THE BEST PROF AT KSU. super lenient and easy grader. She proof-reads big assignments and offers a lot of grace. The class itself was a little odd, but there are important topics. She is amazing and its an easy class. A couple of small assignments and a research paper.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Group projects

comment: Wow is this class easy. Seriously, just show up to class and you get free participation grades. There was only two papers: unit one response and final research paper. The papers were so easy I had to worry about exceeding the length instead of meeting it. Very kind and cares about her students.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: Professor Lewis is amazing! She's a wonderful educator and an even better person. If you are lucky enough to take this course expect great feedback and fun assignments. She really goes out of her way to make the class engaging! I highly recommend taking her course it will be the best English class you've ever taken.

She does a great job at letting the class discuss the topics and literature but I personally think a majority of it is inappropriate and irrelevant to the point she wants to get across. The class is a book club where u watch or read something that is mostly uncomfortable and then talk about it. Exam questions r VERY specific. I do not recommend
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: What a great professor, prob the best one for ENGL at KSU. The lectures are very engaging and she actually lets the students be a part of them rather than it just being the professor running their mouth the whole time. All assignments are interesting and she grades very fairly. She does take attendance but this is a class you will want to come to.

I loved this class mostly because Mrs. Lewis was so good at giving feedback. Her paper outlines are very clear and explanatory as well as her lectures. I cannot say one bad thing about this class because it did teach me a lot. I would 100% recommend you take any of her courses.
Easiest English lit class!!
Easy A

Sweetest professor Ive ever had - took her for engl1101, 1102, AND world lit. Awesome teacher and the content/lectures/assignments are very interesting. Typical workload, and due dates are every tues+Saturday. Gives REALLY good feedback as well on papers

Dr. Lewis is a literally angel sent to remind us that education can actually be fun and enjoyable. I'm about half way through her class and have enjoyed every assignment. She's looking for creativity and deep thought, not perfection in grammar. Assignments are fun & engaging and she responds quickly to questions. Final exam is a creative project

This has been my BEST professor ever, and I'm a sophomore. There are 4 papers, super easy and lots of freedom. She gives great feedback and really cares about your improvements! There are easy fun assignments! This professor is the best English teacher I have taken! I had to retake this class because of my last professor, take her class!!

I ADORE Professor Lewis! She made class so easy and fun! There is only 4 papers and little homework assignments that are so easy! She isn't a tough grader and she gives tons of feedback and always answers very quickly!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Lewis is great! Her class isn't full of papers to write with very specific topics to write about like some professors, most of the papers have such a broad topic that you really have the freedom to write about what you want which really makes passing so much easier and there isn't tons of homework assignments either! TAKE HER CLASS!

Dr. Lewis was made this class extremely enjoyable and simple. There were weekly assignments, but they were quick and easy. The participation grade is 20% and pretty much all of those grades were: if you complete them, you will receive a 100. She is responsive to email and her feedback is helpful to be successful in writing papers. Easy A!
She is very helpful and wants everyone to pass. She is always more than happy to answer any questions.

Sweetest professor I've had. She is so caring and considerate. Her class is beautiful. She makes you think about life. She makes the thought processes really deep during class discussions. The type of class you sit back and enjoy. Not stressful at all.

Don't regret taking this class whatsoever! One of the best professors I've ever had, she cares more about you and teaching you valuable lessons than letting a grade for something dumb define you. 5 attendance freebies, occasional group work in class, and since it's a hybrid class, there's online work that I personally enjoyed. Seriously, take it!

Professor Lewis is the best! Took her in a hybrid World Lit class and she made it so fun! She tries her best to make sure all students feel comfortable in her class. We had 5 skip days so attendance was mandatory but her class was so easy and fun that it didn't matter. Take her if you can!

Only had for half a semester, she was a replacement of the original professor. she did go easy on us but overall her energy is amazing and she is so sweet, you can reach out to her and she will reply within minutes.

Professor Lewis is amazing. It would be a mistake not to take her. As long as you keep up with your work you should be able to make an A. Not a hard class at all, clear expectations. She is willing to read your papers and provide feedback before the due date which helps a lot with your grade. BEST TEACHER PLEASE TAKE HER

Doctor Lewis is honestly such a kind hearted professor at KSU. She is so funny and really cares about her students. Her lectures are actually enjoyable and her work is not hard or long. You even get to watch and discuss superhero movies and other cool stuff!!

Professor Lewis was such a great professor. Usually online classes are hard to keep up with and can be confusing, but professor Lewis was so clear on her expectations and does not overwhelm you with work. She is very fair and gives great feedback on your papers. I would take her again in a heart beat.

Dr. Lewis was one of my favorite professors this semester. She cares about her students and her teaching. She is always available outside of class to help you with papers and she will even read them for you first before turning it in. She also lets you write more about what you love towards the end. For sure take Dr. Lewis!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Dr. Lewis is a very nice and caring professor. Readings are all posted to d2l and are either short stories or poems. Course material relates back to real world issues. There are 3 exams that consist of a multiple choice section and a written section. She assigns a final project where you can practically do anything within reason.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Amazing teacher! it was a hybrid class, so we met on Monday's & Wednesday's and had an online assignment due on Friday's by midnight. There are no essays, and the tests are very easy. 3 tests and about 30 multiple choice and a written portion. The written portion is due by Friday (about a week to do it). You get 5 skips before starting to get 0's.

this is my first online class experience and it was amazing!! due dates are tuesdays and saturdays. there are 4 units and each ends with a major assessment like a paper or project. clear rubrics and very helpful feedbacks! she has a groupme and it doesnt take long for a response. overall, this class is very straightforward and id highly recommend
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria

comment: My fav Professor. Super fun class also super easy. DO THE READINGS THEY ARE SHORT AND EASY!! Fair grader. Tests come w study guides and are straight from POSTED power points. You get to watch black mirror, black panther, and breaking bad and discuss it. Super fun and easy class as long as u do the little work. 5 Freebie attendance days

Took her online. Pretty straight forward and easy! A few papers but nothing too difficult or out of the ordinary english class. Dates are spread pretty well so its a easy class to keep up with! She responds super quickly as well. Definitely would take her for an easy A!

Take her if you can! She is, by far, the best literature I have ever had. She is so caring and wants her students to succeed. Her grading is very lenient and classwork is graded based on an attempt. 3 test (half MC half take home essay), weekly online activities, and final project that is basically anything you want to do.

Dr. Lewis is absolutely amazing. You go over readings in class so you really dont have to read prior and she gives you a few assignments in class that as long as you do it you will get a 100. I took the hybrid class so there were online assignments every Friday that were super short and she gives 100s on everything. If you can, TAKE HER!!!!

she is so extremely sweet. she's not mean at all and she definitely wants you to pass. she chooses great things to read / watch that we discuss in class and makes it fun. i took it as a hybrid, so online assignment every friday but usually short and easy! love her and one of my favorite professors!

TAKE HER!!! She is so sweet and funny. Her lectures are very short but interesting. There are only 4 papers. She is very helpful and gives great feedback. She's accessible with her office hours, and if you can't go she is more than happy to look over your work via email. I would take her again in a heartbeat.

She's really interactive with students and is always in a cheerful mood. I never got bored in her class because she doesn't dwell on lectures. She gives ACTUAL feedback on papers to help you write better. She's super reasonable and enjoyable. If you hate literature i'm sure you will gain an interest in it after her class.

I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND. NO TEXTBOOK FOR THIS CLASS. There are 4 papers, occasional 10 question quiz, a couple of free writes and discussions, and some peer reviews. The peer reviews are all dependent on the type of classmates you have, but Dr. Lewis is always willing to help with your paper if you reach out.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: Dr. Lewis is a great professor! I took her for ENGL 1102 online and it was honestly a really insightful class. There are four papers, and for each paper are mandatory peer reviews. In between are HW assignments due each Saturday and Tuesday. It wasn't a lot at all and I took this class with a full schedule. I would absolutely take her again!

Way too much for an 1102 class. Lots of papers, and the schedule was VERY confusing. Extremely time consuming. Peer reviews are mandatory for each paper and that was the worst part of it. You cannot count on your peers to give a clear and helpful review. Would not recommend to anyone with a full course load.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: Easy and fun, little to no writing, lenient attendance policy and actually doesn't hate students. Knows her stuff.

I took this class online and Prof. Lewis was just an all around great professor. She had essay topics that were actually interesting to write about, gave great feedback on essays, and was available outside of class. She also provided a lot of extra resources if writing isn't your strong suit. Definitely an easy and chill course to take.

If you get the chance to take Dr. Lewis DO IT. You have 4 papers across the semester, you are always fully prepared to turn them in. A few discussion posts & other writing prompts, easy if you make sure to read the articles. She gives great feedback on papers & is always fast in responding if you need help & will work through assignments with you.

I took this class online and it was very easy and laid back. She has a routine, every Tuesday and Saturday things are due which include paper proposals, peer reviews, open note quizzes, or essays. It sounds like a lot, but online was definitely the way to go. No exams!!

She is super nice and really wants to help you! She is very easy to get outside of class. Overall, you could get away without the textbook but we did have a couple readings that we talked about in the textbook. A lot of the readings were on D2L. I definitely recommend taking her!

Professor Lewis is by far one of my favorite teachers Ever!! Going into her class, I was never required to write papers and I felt that was my weakness. However, she cares for all of her students and provided help during her office hours or by email to look over ever single one of my drafts. We had 4 papers and a participation grade almost everyday

BEST ENGLISH PROFESSOR EVER!! I love her and how she teaches. There is a lot of reading and reading quizzes but if she sees the class is doing well on those, she starts to phase them out. I would 100% take her again. I really enjoyed her class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Doctor Lewis is a great professor. She really wants you to do well and is always willing to help. UTILIZE HER OFFICE HOURS! I am not a particularly strong writer, but she would read my entire draft and critique me which made me a much stronger writer. I learned how to write well in her class. If you can take her, take her!

Amelia Lewis is AMAZING. She makes me enjoy English when it is my worse subject. Definitely an awesome online class yet I'm sure she's great in class too. Not too hard of a grader but she makes sure you don't slack off. :) She's so helpful & if you send her your drafts, she will review them.

I LOVE HER! I wish i could take her for all my english courses!! She cares about the things she talks about so it makes the class very interesting! she can be awkward but she knows it it makes a joke of it I LOVE HER CLASS! If you put in the effort and read you will pass! Ive had an A since day 1:)
She is fantastic! Available via email or discussion posts. Will review and provide feedback for individuals, if requested. Absolutely take her classes. I am searching for more myself!

Took Prof Lewis' online for ENGL1102 and I definitely enjoyed the course. Just do the work on time and the class is an easy A! Had topics that were very thought provoking and if you had trouble, she responds in a timely manner. Not too much required work for an online class, but we had assignments due every Tues/Sat.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: I took world lit with Professor Lewis and it was a great class. She is very caring towards students and will try to help everyone. Definitely likes to give out pop quizes and tests can be a little difficult. You should still take her!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: Professor Lewis was an amazing teacher. She really cared about her students' success, and would offer help when a student needed it. She explained difficult topics, and was very thorough. I do not think the professor has anything she really needs to work on. She outlined this course perfectly, and cared about her students. I took world lit with her
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Amazing lectures

comment: Professor Lewis was awesome for my first English class for college. She loves to do powerpoints and is willing to help you on your paper if you ask her. She is awesome professor!! I wanted to take her again, but her class filled up quick!!!

She is a really great teacher! Caring and wants the best for students. 4 papers all semester. The rest of the assignments are in class and usually group work. There is a presentation at the end, but it's super easy and not long! TAKE HER!!

I rarely use the book in her class, share a book between two or three people. She's funny, interesting and gives amazing feedback on how to fix your papers. We do in class peer review, and she speaks in a way that is extremely clear. There is no bias, and she's amazing. Good luck!
She's great! I had her for World Literature and if you read all her power points, its an easy A on her tests. She puts all her stuff on D2L and is a really great teacher.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: I absolutely loved Professor Lewis. I was sad to see she wasn't teaching English 1102 because I was definitely going to take her again. We only had 4 papers the entire semester, and the rest of the grades are in class assignments, half of which we worked in a group on. She is very positive and extremely nice. I highly recommend taking her for 1101.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: I loved Dr. Lewis's class! Each class had great discussions about the texts we had read. There were a few pop quizzes, but they were mostly free writes just to ensure we had read, and she only gave them if she suspected we weren't reading. Pretty tough tests, but not a harsh grader at all. Participate in class and it will be fine!

She is passionate about the subject which allows the class to be engaged. She truly cares about what students have to say, and this is not really a class soley focused on grades. She's a fun professor, helpful, and so straightforward. As long as you do what she says, it's an easy A. I passed with a 99 and that is just because I read.

Professor Lewis is AMAZING. She may be a little corny at times, but she is great teacher. She is definitely NOT a tough grader. Attendance is really not her main concern but she gives a lot of in class assignments.

Such a nice professor. She likes to make sure that everyone understands material, and gives adequate time to write papers. She's very approachable, so don't be  afraid to ask questions! VERY EASY grader, very interesting class.
I love her ! She is super helpful! Also gives essay examples of the type of paper she expects! Amazing person and teacher! Would take again!

Very nice and funny professor. Lots of assigned readings, but sparknotes usually covers everything you need to know for reading quizzes. Participate in the class discussions because the more discussion your class has, the less likely she'll assign future reading quizzes because she thinks everyone's keeping up with the readings. Take her!
